item.title: WLFI Multisig transferred 17.625 billion tokens to a certain contract address, and then transferred back 5 billion tokens
item.description: On September 1st, according to on-chain analyst AI Yii ai_9684xtpa, 2 hours ago, the WLFI official multisig wallet transferred 17.625 billion tokens to contract 0xFef...b14B4. Subsequently, 5 billion of those tokens were transferred back to the multisig address. This represents the largest single-transaction amount for this address in 11 months, and the purpose of the contract remains unknown.

item.title: Gate will list Moonchain (MCH) and launch a HODLer Airdrop, sharing 240,000 MCH
item.description: On September 1st, as per an official announcement, Gate will list Moonchain (MCH) spot trading on September 3rd at 20:00 (UTC+8). The 286th Moonchain (MCH) HODLer Airdrop event has begun and will conclude on September 3rd at 18:00 (UTC+8). Users holding 1 GT can participate without charge to receive the airdrop and share 240,000 MCH.

item.title: Binance will list WLFI and apply Seed Label
item.description: On September 1st, Binance will list World Liberty Financial (WLFI) and apply a seed tag.Binance will list World Liberty Financial (WLFI) on September 1, 2025, at 9:00 PM (UTC time) and commence trading for the following spot trading pairs. New spot trading pairs: WLFI/USDT, WLFI/USDC.

item.title: A certain contract whale suffered a loss of over $23 million in a week, with their long position of 20,800 ETH liquidated at $4,297.67 per ETH.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by lookonchain, the whale address 0xa523 suffered a loss of more than 23 million US dollars within just one week. However, it always held a long position in ETH at a high level.In the past 15 hours, it has once again added 20,800 ETH (worth 92.8 million US dollars) to its long position at prices of $4470 and $4450. Its take-profit target is $5300, but the liquidation price is dangerously close to $4297.67.

item.title: The high-profile ETH to BTC whale has once again deposited 1000 BTC into HyperLiquid to increase their ETH holdings.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, the BTC ancient whale that had previously made a high-profile switch from ETH deposited another 1000 BTC into HyperLiquid 10 minutes ago in order to increase their ETH holdings. Yesterday, the whale deposited 4000 BTC into HyperLiquid (approximately $435.3 million) and sold it to obtain 96,859 ETH.

item.title: A Whale Purportedly Liquidates 4720 ETH, Potentially Profiting Up to $9.5 Million
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by on-chain analyst AI Auntie ai_9684xtpa, a whale that had previously made a profit of $2.34 million through four UNI arbitrage opportunities was suspected of liquidating 4720 ETH ($21.08 million) 8 hours ago. If sold, it could potentially make a profit of $9.514 million.They withdrew ETH from FalconX at an average price of $2452 on 07.01, achieving a two-month return on investment (ROI) of 82.2%.

item.title: Hyperliquid High-Profit Whale closes SOL and ETH short positions, goes long with 6590 ETH in a flip trade
item.description: On September 1st, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, beginning with a mere $1.02 million, trader 0x044d has managed to increase his account on Hyperliquid to $26.07 million, achieving a net profit of more than $25 million.Just 3 hours ago, he closed out a $17.68 million short position in SOL and a $35.45 million short position in ETH, generating a profit of $1.06 million. Subsequently, he promptly went long and opened a new long position of 6590 ETH ($28.9 million) with a leverage of 20x.

item.title: Trump: U.S. Prices See "Significant Decrease," Virtually No Inflation
item.description: On September 1st, U.S. President Trump declared that U.S. prices have "fallen sharply" with almost no inflation. Tariffs have brought in trillions of dollars to the U.S. (FXStreet).

item.title: A whale averaged down by purchasing an additional 1237 ETH at an average price of $4393.
item.description: On September 1st, based on the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale address. After holding $5.43 million USDT for approximately 45 days, it used the funds to purchase 1237 ETH on Binance at a price of $4393 per ETH.Address: 0x3255cdee41ad8ad989547c745975244bf69401a4

item.title: Analysis: The cryptocurrency market correction shows no signs of ending yet, with a key focus on this week's non-farm payroll and unemployment rate data.
item.description: On September 1st, Adam, a macro researcher from Greeks.live, shared a post stating that this week, the main BTC implied volatility remained stable at 37%, while the major maturities of ETH fell below 70%, with the short-term falling below 65%, still almost double that of BTC. The pullback has been ongoing for more than half a month and there is no sign of ending yet, making it relatively cost-effective to engage in bottom fishing in short-term options.There are many macro events this week, and the non-farm payroll and unemployment rate data on Friday are quite important. The impact of the Federal Reserve on the macro market this month will be significant, and its impact on the crypto market will be more direct. At the same time, WLFI went live on the Ethereum mainnet today as one of the most important TGE projects recently. The large amount of new tokens needs to absorb market existing funds, creating significant market pressure.
